description.en-US: Add the Ezy Speed Test & Custom Web Search extension to get a free speed test tool by clicking the favicon on the toolbar & custom Yahoo® search from your browser search bar. About this extension Your browser will be customized upon installation of the Ezy Speed Test & Custom Web Search extension. Test the speed of your broadband connection and get details of your upload, download, jitter, and ping speed. You can also access IP and ISP info using this free tool. Custom web search: With custom access to Yahoo® search, finding videos, images, audio files and more is now easier. Enjoy a brand new browsing experience and get instant results for every search. Here’s a summary of user data that our add-on collects and how we use this information: 1. IP address and geolocation derived therefrom : We collect your IP address and the geolocation derived from it when you use the speed test tool offered by our extension. We anonymize your IP address and do not trace it back to you. We only use this information for analytics and reporting purposes and to offer the functionalities of the add-on. You can opt-out of sharing the above information with us, however, you will only be able to access limited features. 2. Technical data: Technical information (such as domain name and user agent) is also collected by the add-on to plan product upgrades and help with fraud detection. This data is not personally identifiable and is used for optimization purposes and cannot be used to identify users. 3. Information you explicitly share with us: We collect the search inputs that you provide while using the search features of the add-on, to return relevant results. We may also collect information that you may choose to provide us (such as your name, telephone number and/or email address) if submitted by you as part of a feedback form, crash report, enhancement suggestion or other communication from you to us. This information is only used to respond to user queries or concerns and will not be shared with any third party. For additional information, please read our Privacy Policy: https://ezyspeedtest.com/speedtest/privacypolicy_ff.html Any feedback helps us make improvements to the product experience. Please feel free to share your suggestions. If you no longer need this extension, you can uninstall it in a few easy steps. This add-on is using Yahoo® as a search provider. I agree to abide by the Terms of Service & Privacy Policy and to install this extension by clicking the button above. Yahoo is a registered trademark of Apollo Global Management Inc. Privacy Policy: https://ezyspeedtest.com/speedtest/privacypolicy_ff.html Terms of Service: https://ezyspeedtest.com/speedtest/termsofservice_ff.html

name.en-US: Ezy Speed Test & Custom Web Search

summary.en-US: Add the Ezy Speed Test & Custom Web Search extension and click the favicon on your toolbar to access a speed test site & Yahoo® search.
